caption.title: SPI variable at different time scales.
caption.p: The CV mean logarithmic score, the DIC, and the likelihood ratio R LR 2 statistic for models including monthly and yearly random effects and an exposure–lag–response function with time lags from 0 to 5 months for the SPI averaged over 1 month, 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months). The best indicator is shaded in grey. CV, cross-validated; DIC, deviance information criterion; SPI, Standardised Precipitation Index.
Click here for additional data file.
